name: react-spa-template
description: React Single Page Application template with routing

scripts.build: npm run clear:build && npm run clear:dist && npm run compile && webpack --mode=production --node-env=production && shx cp index.prod.html ./dist/index.html
scripts.build:dev: npm run clear:build && npm run clear:dist && npm run compile && webpack --mode=development && shx cp index.dev.html ./dist/index.html
